code.value:
console.log("Showing Grid Ops",target)

target.showHUD([
    {type:"button",label:"Move Up",script:"Maps/Grid/Move Grid", data:{dir:"up"}},
    {type:"button",label:"Move Down",script:"Maps/Grid/Move Grid", data:{dir:"down"}},
    {type:"button",label:"Move Left",script:"Maps/Grid/Move Grid", data:{dir:"left"}},
    {type:"button",label:"Move Right",script:"Maps/Grid/Move Grid", data:{dir:"right"}},
    {type:"button",label:"Larger",script:"Maps/Grid/Size Grid", data:{inc:0.5}},
    {type:"button",label:"Smaller",script:"Maps/Grid/Size Grid", data:{inc:-0.5}},
    {type:"button",label:"Toggle",script:"Maps/Grid/Toggle"},
    ]);
